DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : EDUCATION : USC FULBRIGHT SCHOLARS
DOC.TEXT: Four USC faculty_members have been named Fulbright scholars to conduct their research abroad next year . The recipients are Doe Mayer of the School of Cinema , William Meezan of the School of Social_Work , Harry Richardson of Urban and Regional Planning , and Arnis Richters of the School_of_Medicine . Chosen along with 800 other academics and scholars nationwide , the USC recipients received grants to study subjects as diverse as media presentations of social health issues in Fiji to conducting research on tissue culture in Riga , Latvia .
